column1: Specifications: "A video recorder with (4) 2.5/3.5" HDD bays that can support up to 30 days of storage for (15) 4K cameras or (50) Full HD cameras."
(1) 10G SFP+ uplink and (1) GbE RJ45 port
Data protection with RAID storage technology
"Weight": "Without mounting brackets: 5.1 kg (11.3 lb)With mounting brackets: 5.2 kg (11.5 lb)"
"Networking interface": "(1) GbE RJ45 port(1) 1/10 GbE SFP+ port"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-5 to 40° C (23 to 104° F)"
"System": "(1) Power: blue/whiteFlashing white: bootup in progressFlashing blue: firmware upgradingSteady white: factory defaults
column2: awaiting adoptionSteady blue: device is adopted"
